title: Certificates of insurance (COI) for contractors/vendors
personalDataVerified: Certificate holder, insured contractor, coverage types/limits, policy numbers, effective dates
personalDataVisible: Policy status for each listed coverage. Link to insurer system (certificate holders, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake certificates of insurance which are extremely common fraud. Domain binding verifies insurer. Real-time verification by certificate holder before allowing contractor work. Short COI lifetime (project duration). COI fraud enables uninsured contractor liability exposure for project owners. Critical for construction and commercial contracts where COI verification is standard practice.
